name: Chris Beck
occupation: Sr. Account Director and New Business Development
education: Bachelor of Arts in Public Relations and Theatre, Coe College (1999 - 2003)

experience.description: Drive growth and expansion of the agency's client base. Responsible for identifying, pursuing, and securing new and organic business opportunities that align with the companyâ€™s strategic goals.

Provide strategic and tactical B2B marketing guidance for a variety of companies in various industries. Lead annual planning, client relationships, team management, and measure success of activities. Offer ongoing client consultation and account management leadership.

Client lead providing strategic and tactical B2B marketing guidance for companies in industries including animal health, electrical wiring systems, audiovisual, construction materials, banking, financial services, large equipment manufacturing, and insurance services.

Provided strategic and tactical B2B marketing guidance for companies in industries such as large equipment manufacturing, industrial and municipal wastewater equipment, mineral exploration products and services, and steel manufacturing.

experience.position: Public Relations Supervisor and Account Service
experience.description: Directed and managed public relations efforts for external B2B clients. Developed PR strategies and plans, facilitated brand audits, secured editorial placements, attended trade shows, hosted editors, and wrote editorial content.

Oversaw marketing and messaging direction. Developed strategic marketing plans for traveling exhibits and brand marketing. Implemented tactical plans across digital, public relations, media buying, event, guerrilla, and grassroots disciplines.

bio: An experienced B2B/B2C marketing professional with a demonstrated history of working in the marketing, public relations, and advertising industries. Skilled in integrated marketing strategy, brand development/management, digital marketing/advertising, content marketing, public relations/media relations, event management, video development, and channel marketing. Knowledge of animal health, electrical wiring systems, audiovisual, manufacturing, construction materials, insurance, financial investment, banking, mining, and wastewater industries. Strong marketing professional with a Bachelor of Arts focused in Public Relations and Theatre from Coe College.
